FuncDef: This command monitors traffic statistics for Link Aggregation Group (LAG) ports. Statistical information for the specified LAG ID(s) displays at the configured interval until the configured count is reached.
CLIs: lag <lag-id> [ <lag-id> ] [ bytes | packets | errors | utilization ] [ interval <seconds> ] [ repeat <repeat> ] [ absolute | rate ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the number of the LAG, with a maximum of five LAG numbers specified in a single statement. Values-1 to 200.
Displays the statistics in bytes only.
Displays the statistics in packets only.
Displays the statistics for errors only.
Displays the statistics in percentage utilization only.
Configures the interval for each display in seconds. Values-3 to 60. ParamDefault: Default- 10 seconds
Configures how many times the command is repeated. Values-1 to 999. ParamDefault: Default- 10
Specifies raw statistics, without processing. No calculations are performed on the delta or rate statistics.
Displays rate-per-second for each statistic instead of the delta.
